CustomField.description: Friendly name displayed in timeline component for the conversation notes.
CustomField.formula: /*IF(ISBLANK(CRM_Theme_Group__c), 'Øvrige', IF(NOT(ISBLANK(CRM_Theme__c)), CRM_Theme_Group__r.Name + ', ' + CRM_Theme__r.Name, CRM_Theme_Group__r.Name)) + IF(ISBLANK(NKS_Owner_Department__c), '', ' - ' + NKS_Owner_Department__c)*/ IF(ISBLANK(NKS_Theme_Group__c), 'Øvrige', IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK(NKS_Theme__c)),(NKS_Theme__r.Name != 'Pensjon')), NKS_Theme_Group__r.Name + ', ' + NKS_Theme__r.Name, IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK(NKS_Subtheme__c)),(NKS_Theme__r.Name == 'Pensjon')),NKS_Theme_Group__r.Name + ', ' + NKS_Subtheme__r.Name,NKS_Theme_Group__r.Name))) + IF(ISBLANK(NKS_Owner_Department__c), '', ' - ' + NKS_Owner_Department__c)
CustomField.label: Timeline Name
